title: 101 Ways to Die in a Hostel
subtitle: Toxic Mold
series: 101 Ways to Die in a Hostel
tagline: Some hostels are a bargain. Others cost you your life.

synopsis.short: A wellness influencer who refuses modern medicine suffers progressive respiratory failure from Stachybotrys (black mold) exposure in a damp basement dorm, dying after weeks of ignoring her body's warnings.

death_teaser: Some things can't be cleansed with positive thinking.
